tool_description: An API showing all the latest  Love  Dating  Relationships  News around the world
name: Love  Dating  Relationships Live
title: Love  Dating  Relationships Live

api_list.name: Get individual  News Source News
api_list.description: Get News About love Dating Relationship From a specific News Resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://love-dating-relationships-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "love-dating-relationships-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
